The Mountain Chief
Chippenham, Wiltshire, England, UK March contest - 1st Lydbrook, 2nd Glastonbury, 3rd Melksham. Prizes - 1st £10 mand cup, 2nd £6, 3rd £4, 4th £2. 8 bands competed.
June 30, 2016, 7:59 a.m. March 20, 2020, 8:12 a.m.
1 Glastonbury (Combined Edge Tools) Lawrence Abram
2 City of Bristol Brass Band James Scott
3 Lydbrook Band Neville Barnett
4 Stroud and District Ellis Williams
Unknown Result Melksham Coronation J. Astle
